variants.Description in input context: This variant causes a missense mutation, changing the amino acid at position 130 from asparagine (N) to serine (S).

Material used.Material Source: HEK293 cells overexpressing the variant and wild-type alpha-synuclein

Readout description.Result Description: The variant caused an increase in alpha-synuclein protein expression levels compared to the wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Alpha-synuclein protein expression levels comparable to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Alpha-synuclein protein expression levels greater than 20% increase compared to wild-type.
